title: More milk for more people
creator_credit: Edmund Reid, Nicholas Balla and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The black-and-white Holstein-Friesian cattle belong to the oldest improved dairy breed in the world and are famous as record milk producers. In Canada their pedigree is safeguarded through registration and control. In this film, foreign cattle buyers are shown why this breed of cattle, raised in Canada, is a safe purchase.
